The goal of islandpaleoarea is to study the effect of paleo-area vs current
area on estimates of diversification.

## Installation

You can install the released the development version of this package from 
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Neves-P/islandpaleoarea")
```
